summary: Defines a diffusion pipeline that orchestrates the Stable Cascade components—tokenizer, CLIP text encoder, diffusion decoder, and VQGAN up‑sampler—to transform textual prompts into high‑resolution images.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation into applications such as creative content creation, advertising, design prototyping, and visual storytelling.
